summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to Unico Properties, Inc., (formerly University Properties, Inc.,) by Ordinance 99871 to maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across Fourth Avenue, north of Seneca Street, by amending Sections 2, and 9 thereof, repealing Sections 6 and 7 and adding new sections 6 and 7, to renew the permit for an additional four years, to establish a lump sum fee for the four year period and to revise the amount of the surety bond and liability insurance.
